{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$1.0M in 2019-2020** on contracts with MWCO.

Across 7 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 3 have at least one amendment (43%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 83% and the average number of amendments was 1.33. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$1.9M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 2.41 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$2.0M. The longest contract was 4.78 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$5.1M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}

- [MWCO Inc](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22MWCO%20Inc%22)
{{< /details >}}
